Package fast3d

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Renderable
    Renderables can be passed to a universe to receive a render()-call during the render-process of the universe
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Panel3d
    a swing component to display a 3d-scene, containing a universe
    subclasses are permitted the possibility to override the render()-method to draw directly into the 3d-scenery or to override the preRender()-method to prepare all data to be draw (for instance apply camera-movement or transformations of the scenery)
    applies the screens aspect ratio automatically to the camera HUDs- Head-up-Displays and 2d GUI components:
